title: Newly Renovated 2+1 Echo Park Home, Seconds Away from Ladybird Cafe
posting_body: ['Newly renovated apartment in prime Echo Park.', 'Simple, clean design and tons of natural light.', 'The extremely relaxing and quiet neighborhood feels as if you are up in the mountains yet still within a short walking distance of all the amenities and hot spots on Sunset Blvd.', 'Incredibly fun neighborhood to walk and hike around.', 'Discover new secret stair streets, grab a morning coffee at Lady Byrd or wander over to Elysian Park for a jog or hike.', 'This bi-level (850 sqft) 2-bedroom 1-bathroom unit offers an open kitchen/dining and living area downstairs while both bedrooms and bath are tucked away upstairs.', 'Abundant light and lovely hilltop views are among the highlights of this tranquil apartment.', 'The unit features natural white oak floors, shaker style cabinets, all new appliances, washer & dryer and white quartz countertops.', 'The bathroom has a modern design that includes a tiled shower/tub combo, new modern vanity, fixtures and designer tiled floor.', "Additionally, the downstairs is cooled and heated by a powerful mini-split system while each upstairs bedroom has their own independent a/c & heat unit you'll be comfortable all year!", "After you've enjoyed all the interior amenities, step outside and enjoy a glass of wine and a beautiful sunset while sitting on your private patio.", 'Presented by Eddie Kohan w/ Reservoir Partners.', 'Brandy Brooks', "Sotheby's International Realty", 'CADRE #01945892']
